alert.note: Alert for Clarke; Washington (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued January 09 at 2:12PM CST until January 09 at 2:45PM CST by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 245 PM CST FOR NORTHEASTERN WASHINGTON AND CENTRAL CLARKE COUNTIES... At 211 PM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located over Saint Stephens, or 7 miles west of Jackson, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Jackson, Saint Stephens, Leroy and Whatley. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 600 PM CST for southwestern Alabama. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
